.class public auto ansi sealed TaskCompleteCheck extends System.MulticastDelegate

Public Delegate Function TaskCompleteCheck(sender As Object, taskId As Guid, creationPtoperties As SPWorkflowTaskProperties, properties As Hashtable, executor As String, ByRef outcome As String) As Boolean

public delegate bool TaskCompleteCheck(System::Object ^ sender, Guid taskId, SPWorkflowTaskProperties ^ creationPtoperties, Hashtable ^ properties, System::String ^ executor, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % outcome);
type TaskCompleteCheck = delegate of obj * Guid * SPWorkflowTaskProperties * Hashtable * string * -> bool

Docs.param: The GUID of the workflow task identifier (ID).
An object that contains the properties of the workflow task when it was created.
A hash table that contains the properties of the workflow task.
ID of the user who is executing the task.
Docs.summary: A delegate that is used to determine if a workflow task has been completed.
Docs.returns: A Boolean value that indicates whether the workflow task has been completed.
